title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2529.3 - Form and content of a PAR
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2529.3 - Form and content of a PAR
State Regulations
A PAR may be filed only on a form prescribed by the DHCR, which shall be verified or affirmed by the party filing same, or his or her
duly designated representative, and which shall have attached thereto a
complete copy of the order to be reviewed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2529.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
